dct_description_sm: Pagination above map: "III.c". No text below map. Issued in his: Kurtz-bündige Abbildund Vorstellung der Gantzen Welt, Ulm, Georg Wilhelm Kühnen, 1692
Reissued, [1692], with text below map: "Das mitternachtige America theilet sich: ..." , and pagination above map "III.c"
Reissued, [1692], with text below map: "Das Mitternachtische America. ..." , and pagination above map "III".
California as an island of Briggs type and labelled "I. California". Engraved by: [Gabriel Bodenehr].
